document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich said on wednesday that he was just discussing ideas when he described his power to name a senator to replace president barack obama as "f***in' golden" and not something he would "give up ... for f***in' nothing."
document.title: blagojevich explains comments on senate seat
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich said on wednesday that he was just discussing ideas when he described his power to name a senator to replace president barack obama as "f***in' golden" and not something he would "give up ... for f***in' nothing."
